headline: BNY to Speak at the UBS Financial Services Conference
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation ("BNY") (NYSE: BK), a global financial services company, today announced that Emily Portney, Global Head of Asset Servicing, will speak at the UBS Financial Services Conference in Key Biscayne, Florida at 1:00 p.m. ET on Tuesday, February 11, 2025. The discussion may include forward-looking statements and other material information.
